articles.description: SpaceX will soon launch an all-civilian crew for its Inspiration4 mission. Is the adventure worth the risk?
articles.title: Good Luck to the All-civilian Inspiration4 Crew - Eetasia.com

articles.content: AirAsia Group CEO Tony Fernandes has posted a video on Facebook to provide an update on the ticket refund situation at AirAsia. He shared that 1.5 million people have been refunded since Jan 2020 and… [+1373 chars]
articles.description: AirAsia has already refunded 1.5 mil people since Jan 2020. Tony said "COVID-19 is not our fault, we are not bad people. It has obviously affected us badly like many other airlines."
articles.title: Tony Fernandes: AirAsia committed to settle 450,000 outstanding refunds - SoyaCincau.com
